content: vintage bunny pin materials -small amount of any worsted weight yarn -size h crochet hook -a googly eye -small craft pom-pom for tail -pin backing or safety pin -glue pattern chain 3 round 1 10 double_crochet in the 3rd chain from your hook creating a circle make a picot stitch ch3 slip_stitch in 3rd chain from hook and then add 2 more double_crochet into the circle slip_stitch into the 1st double_crochet to join round 2 chain 2 does not count as stitch 3dc into same stitch chain 10 slip_stitch into double_crochet at the base of the chain chain 10 again slip_stitch into the same double_crochet and then single_crochet into the same space as the initial 3dc from the beginning of this round fasten_off weave in ends add the googly eye and pom-pom for eye and tail add a pin backing or safety pin to the back enjoy
